title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H1 – Feb 3 2022
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H1 – Feb 3 2022
description:
Canadian truckers show us the way back to freedom. L.A. Mayor Eric Garcetti says he "held his breath" during maskless photo with Magic Johnson. C&B say Garcetti should be fired due to that dumb comment alone. The devastating collapse of the anti-trumpers: Zucker, Avenatti, the Cuomos. CNN'S Alisyn Camerota defends Jeff Zucker. Clay puts on his lawyer hat and dives into his employment law past to explain some obvious reasons Camerota missed as to why bosses must disclose such relationships. Buck says he and Clay will hold a mirror to CNN and "not back away from this one."

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
